48.1.hd_quote: An instinctive recognition of what is practical and deserves attention.
48.1.behavioral_axis: Goes inward, sorts what’s actually useful, builds depth quietly.
48.1.shadow_axis: Feels unseen → judges its own depth as “insignificant.”

48.2.hd_quote: The awareness that to successfully establish a new form one cannot neglect the most positive attributes.
48.2.behavioral_axis: Knows the solution is good only if the high-quality parts stay intact.
48.2.shadow_axis: Fear of inadequacy → lets others degrade the pattern into decadence.

48.3.hd_quote: Symbolized by the 'no-moon' phase where the potential of light is unrecognized, unavailable and unknowable.
48.3.behavioral_axis: Stays with its process even when no one sees or understands it.
48.3.shadow_axis: Anxiety that its brilliance will stay buried → premature sharing.

48.4.hd_quote: The good sense to take advantage of the restriction on short-term activity to assess the situation and restructure for long-term goals.
48.4.behavioral_axis: Uses slow periods to retool systems so the depth can finally be seen.
48.4.shadow_axis: Resists restructuring → later must do it under pressure anyway.

48.5.hd_quote: A natural urge to apply energy to action.
48.5.behavioral_axis: Brings the well’s depth to the public and says, “Let’s do it.”
48.5.shadow_axis: Pushes action before the depth is mature → others lose trust.

48.6.behavioral_axis: Shares depth and is refueled by the sharing → endless well.
48.6.shadow_axis: Holds back out of ‘why bother,’ weakening the value loop.
